lever.additional:
Operations Platform (aka "OpsPlatform") builds services and products for Gojek’s Driver, Merchant, and Customer operations. The products we build enables us to -

1.Handle all of the incoming customer, driver, merchants and service partners queries; automated resolution of queries using rule engine, ML/AI, chatbots; We also have In-App Help SDKs (Android, iOS, Web) that enables speedy resolution of customer queries.
2.Automated onboarding for drivers, merchants; end-to-end KYC using OCR, ML/AI models, face-biometrics, 3rd party validations/verifications, user segmentation, fraud detection and blacklisting.
3.Inventory and orders of branded merchandise for drivers and service partners; tools to organize and coordinate community initiatives.
4.AdTech for 2W and 4W vehicles, measure reachability and impact of the Ads

Gojek is an equal opportunity workplace that is committed to diversity and inclusion. At Gojek we celebrate our differences, because we believe that diversity not only creates a healthier work environment for our employees, but also helps our business thrive. 



About us

Gojek is a technology startup based in Jakarta, Indonesia. Specialising in ride-hailing and logistics, we are also the only company in Southeast Asia to be part of Fortune's 50 Companies That Changed the World (2017).

Gojek is a Super App: one app with over 20 services including food delivery, commuting, digital payments, shopping, hyper-local delivery, massages, and many more.

Gojek is Indonesia’s first and fastest growing unicorn building an on-demand empire. Our total of 2,000,000 driver-partners collectively travel 16.5 million KM daily – making us Indonesia’s de-facto transportation choice.

Gojek is a verb! Gojek is a way of life!
lever.description:
ABOUT THE ROLE

Operations Platform (aka "OpsPlatform") builds services and products for Gojek’s Customers, Drivers, Merchants, and Service Partner operations. Onboarding & KYC group in Ops Platform enables onboarding and KYC verification for our Driver, Merchants and Customers. This is enabled by host of Products developed by the group:

KYC Auto-Approval Tools
The team develops and maintains hosts of tools that allow speedy and automatic approvals of KYC. This includes OCR reader to detect Personal Information from National Identity cards or Driver Licence, gauging confidence of the detection process. Face detection and recognition tools to gauge the quality and suitability of selfies and to match selfie with reference photos. This combined with the automated verification of the KYC information leads to end-to-end auto-approved KYC flow.In-App and Assisted Onboarding SDKDevelop and maintain

In-App onboarding SDK: that allows for potential drivers to self-register, upload documents and get informed about their application process. Also allows for Assisted onboarding SDK that is used by Gojek Agents to onboard a driver in Service Units.

Petros Verification Portal: A generic portal developed and maintained by the team which enables various groups to get any data manually verified by a KYC agent. This portal utilises the power of our in-house queuing system and the document store to make the process seamless.

Fleet Portals: Fleet service and web portals are created and maintained to manage fleets of taxis that partner with Gojek. The portals let fleets to onboard new drivers and add vehicles to their inventory and manage the fleet driver lifecycle. 

Driver Supply Throttling: Allow the business to control the levers of driver supply by setting rules for onboarding drivers across regions. Also allows to sort and filter based on driver quality, and background checks.

lever.text: Manager,Software Engineering - Onboarding and KYC, Ops Platform

lists.content:
• As Engineering Manager, you will be leading all the sub-teams and reporting to Head of Engineering for Ops Platform
  • Work closely with Onboarding & KYC Group Product Manager, a partner in planning, execution and timely delivery of the commitments
  • Accountable for the Technology and Architecture decisions
  • Preparing and executing Technology roadmap for Product initiatives
  • Preparing and executing Technology initiatives taken by Engineering Org on your group
  • Accountable for ensuring scalability, and uptime on services managed by the group
  • Communicate technology and business strategies effectively with all the teams in the groupMentoring, coaching and implementing support system for people to achieve their highest potential
  • Help in scaling the org and attracting talent

• 8+ yrs of experience in Technology, with last 4+ yrs in a leadership role at Team or Group level
  • Experienced with one of the Agile Iterative Software Development Process, e.g. XP, Scrum, Kanban
  • Hands-on with technology, contributes ~50% of the time through direct coding
  • Strong communicator, and able to effectively communicate with cross-functional, distributed and diverse team members
  • Tech visionary and up-to-date with technology trends to incorporate them in the roadmap and have an operational edge in business
  • Technology Leader, and able to understand and execute technology initiatives by proper planning and implementation
  • Excellent organizational skills to coordinate complex and multi-team initiatives
  • Excellent time management skills to prioritize and focus on value delivering initiatives

• Programming Languages: Golang, Ruby on Rails, Java/Kotlin, Clojure, Scala, Python
  • XP: Test Driven Development, Pair programming, CI/CD
  • Services: JSON-REST and GRPC
  • Deployments: GKE, Kubernetes, Docker, Google Cloud, AWS
  • Product Management Tools: JIRA, Confluence
